website_summaries.verdict: The Mizuno Wave Rider 21 is a neutral running road shoe that has focused on upgrading its comfort and in-shoe feel, while still providing most of the benefits delivered by its predecessor. According to many of those who have tried it, it proved to be a dependable shoe for gym workouts, daily running, or marathon training.
pros: Plenty of users stated that the Mizuno Wave Rider 21 was sufficiently cushioned
Several runners expressed that their feet felt supported during their runs
A majority of testers said that the shoe was comfortable
A good number of runners observed that the materials used in the manufacturing were of high quality
The Mizuno Wave Rider 21 felt lightweight, which resulted in a relaxed and steady cadence, based on several reviews
Many testers were glad that the midsole was very responsive
The upper’s ventilation was commended by one reviewer
He said that his feet were kept dry and comfortable during runs
One user narrated that his back pain went away while running with the shoe
He usually did not get a similar experience with other running shoes
The outsole had a good grip, one runner said
cons: One runner felt that the new colors were more muted compared to the ones from the previous version
Other users were not appreciative of the limited colorways
Some testers said that the toe box initially felt narrow
They had to break the shoe in to get a more comfortable fit

customer_reviews.title: Super Running Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Have previously purchased Mizuno running trainers, old set needed replacing so just moved up the number to these. Currently at 375km over about 6months of use, no real problems to report. I am a neutral runner and mainly midfoot strike. They feel as supportive and light as the day I bought them. Wear on the sole has been nice and even. I use these for all my runs from 2k through to half marathons almost always on tarmac. Have had a few trail runs in the mud and they were a little slippy, but this was of course to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: As always I'm somewhat apprehensive about buying running shoes online, as I worry that I'll be parting with a lot of money and that the shoes will be unsuitable. I needn't have worried in this instance, as these shoes are excellent. They're extremely comfortable to run in and they look good too. I'm a low mileage plodder so I can't say how the shoes perform over 5k, but I guess they'll be very good. I went half a size up from my normal size 8 dress shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dudey

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, decent room in shoe, nice spring do make you wanna go faster especially down hill. The green colour I was hesitant about but they look pretty ace and not as ghastly as I was concerned. Expensive but aren't most decent running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent delivery. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than expected, but still good fit, I would recommend going half a size up. Comfy and solid, the Mizuno WR21 are a great purchase for anyone looking for "all terrain" trainers. Good product and excellent delivery times.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: had previous models of those and this one is an improvement for sure. v happy
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable running trainers I have owned
customer_reviews.text: The fit is of course subjective, and I'd highly recommend trying these on in a store before you buy, but this is my third pair of these and I expect to buy many more.
customer_reviews.author: Perennially disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as expected perfect trainers for all level of runners or anyone who is looking for a exceptional good looking pair of trainers
customer_reviews.author: shaun51

customer_reviews.title: Got PB in 1st park run outting
customer_reviews.text: After reading loads of great reviews, I decided to give these a go. I did park run in them the other day and got my best time. I was getting ankle pain in my old shoes, and by getting new ones I wasn’t sure if it was going to go. It did and my body felt great afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First choose shoe
customer_reviews.text: Always buy wave riders. Only reason 4 stars is they always seem to get a hole on the mesh at the top
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Sole peeling off!
customer_reviews.text: Well cushioned, comfortable running shoes. However after 4 months of very light use the sole is peeling away from both shoes. As they are older than 1 month I can’t return them. So I am rather disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno Wave Rider shoes just keep getting better and better, comfortable fit and feel light on the run
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good value trainer/racer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good balance between light weight and cushioning. Comfortable fit - was able to race in them straight away. Will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lintz

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable neutral pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of Wave Riders. A comfortable neutral pair of trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Great running trainer
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers, been a regular user since the Wave 12’s
customer_reviews.author: Mr A S White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item fast delivery and the quality of trainer is excellent . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: stephen patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very good one.
customer_reviews.text: Very good improves my time and comfortable too. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rajendra Kumar Limbu

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after around 40 Miles
customer_reviews.text: Toe cap glue separation after around 40 miles, regular road tempo/interval training with club. Do yourself a favour and buy a different shoe. Mizuno are great for Golf though, shame about running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Rider 21 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Mizuno Ride R 21 running shoe is the good compromise for those looking for light, well cushioned shoes. The new version has been made even more comfortable and responsive thanks to the new U D Wave in the midsole. Suitable for long distances, this shoe is suitable for those with neutral support. The upper in AirMesh with different density for zones depending on the support you need. Mesh tongue for superior breathability High quality removable insole for maximum comfort, cushioning and durability. Padded collar for unparalleled softness and comfort. The midsole has been updated with the introduction of U4icX technology - in close combination with U4ic technology make the midsole lightweight and comfortable giving superior bounce power. X10 rubber outsole for durability in high impact areas and greater grip.
feature_bullets: Air Mesh - Allows air to permeate the exterior providing breathability.
Dynamotion Fit - Provides a fit that moves the way you do, actively working with your foot throughout the gait cycle.
